page.title: 02CONNECTIONS
page.content: where we grow mixed vegetables. there is a greenhouse for growing tomatoes and lettuce. At the side of the house there is a large area divided into a rockery, flowerbeds and fruit trees. We have family living close by.My mother's parents live in the village of Quakers Yard which is about one mile away. On my mother's side of the family there are Italian and French connections and on my father's side we have Americans, Londonersand goodness knows what else. My family are nice and friendly and I enjoy visiting them whenever I can. Both my parents are employed by British Telecommunications, my mother in the offices employed in clerical duties and my father on the technical side. By Lisa Jones Aged 11.
